alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb, central Fulton and north central Clayton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, or near Atlanta, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, East Point, Forest Park, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Belvedere Park, Candler-Mcafee, Midtown, Druid Hills, West End, Sweet Auburn, Turner Field, Kirkwood, Cascade Heights, Lakewood Park, Conley, East Lake, Gresham Park, Little Five Points, and Atlantic Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
